question: What is the theme of 2017 World Youth Skills Day (WYSD)?
option3: Skills Development to Improve Youth Employment
option4: Skills for the Future of Work
answer: Skills for the Future of Work
explanation: The World Youth Skills Day (WYSD) is observed every year on July 15 to raise awareness about the importance of investing in youth skills development. The 2017 theme is “Skills for the Future of Work”.
